attributes.action: Honour the Labour Party Manifesto pledge by holding a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty (EU Constitution)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Lisbon Treaty has been stated to be an amending treaty, not a constitution. Valery Giscard D'Estaing, the author of the constitution, and just about every senior politician in Europe along with the House of Commons Committee have stated that the Lisbon Treaty is the EU Constitution in all but name. A referendum was promised and that manifesto pledge must be honoured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
